snippet: Mark Bathum and Mac Marcoux won silver and bronze in their visually impaired Paralympic super-G race despite trouble in finding and hearing their guides.
abstract: Mark Bathum and Mac Marcoux win silver and bronze in their visually impaired Paralympic super-G race despite trouble in finding and hearing their guides.
lead_paragraph: Mark Bathum and Mac Marcoux won silver and bronze in their visually impaired Paralympic super-G race despite trouble in finding and hearing their guides.
